{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=AP700C |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/17/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MQ4AP700C |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8181 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8181 |wi1_chip2_brand=Philips |wi1_chip2_model=SA2400A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP;RTL8201CP, 3800176, 34GC TAIWAN; |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;GATAX;;G W22, ????A, WP02;1; |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.100.252 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|11Mbps 802.11b Wireless Access Point}}
[http://www.abocom.com.tw/download_show.aspx?ptype=66395a7ea68b3cb8a3e548690eb0df8a&id=3B6D7B3E1B9544716258F5126B71A296 Downloads] "M01-AP700-X20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The manual says the default SSID is '''802.11bAP'''. The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''TECHNICS''' TESA2-0503000d (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.40A max. -> 5VDC, 3.0A).
